abstract: The agreement breaks a logjam that has left Saab’s future in doubt since early April, when the carmaker halted production because it was unable to pay suppliers.
snippet: The agreement breaks a logjam that has left Saab’s future in doubt since early April, when the carmaker halted production because it was unable to pay suppliers.
lead_paragraph: Saab Automobile won a critical reprieve Thursday in its effort to stay afloat.

headline.main: Deal Opens Door for Russian to Invest in Saab
headline.print_headline: Deal Allows a Russian Investor to Help Finance Saab
